title: Longswords
content: ikeLacerateRush Attack Cruel Sting 1d10 (1d8) +1 Slashing Weapon Enchantment +1 Sting The Helpless: A drow elf wielding this weapon deals an additional 1~4 Poison damage against Restrained targets.Ensnaring Strands: Your attack conjures thick sticky webbing that possibly Enwebs your target(s).
